mapper.select: select * from User where user_id in (select to_user_id from Friend where from_user_id=#{user_id} and accept=true UNION select from_user_id from Friend where to_user_id=#{user_id} and accept=true);
select count(*) from Friend where (from_user_id=#{user_id} or to_user_id=#{user_id}) and accept=true ;
select count(*) from Friend where (to_user_id=#{to_user_id} and from_user_id=#{from_user_id}) or (to_user_id=#{from_user_id} and from_user_id=#{to_user_id});
select * from Friend where to_user_id=#{to_user_id} and from_user_id=#{from_user_id};
mapper.update: update Friend set accept=true where friend_no=#{friend_no};
